page.title: 02Education in Hungerford.
page.content: There are three schools in Hungerford.The nursery school for children aged 3\ to 5. The primary school for puplis aged 5 to 11 and the John 'O' Gaunt secondary for children aged 11 t0 16. Mrs Pomroy,head of nursery school told us that this has been standing for forty five years and caters for sixty children.They have parties at Christmas and Easter or other special occasions.On a normal day children usually do painting,play dough,jig saws and many other things. Mrs Huxtable present head of the primary school told us that the school is seventy five years old and has 12 teachers and 348 pupils in classes of about 30 where they remain for 1 year. The children are grouped at tables and the rooms have attractive displays. Many clubs are run by the teachers.
